channel.title: Making donator status keep an extra item on death
channel.description:
Im thinking of making the donator status make the player to keep an extra item on death. more like protect item on death but perminate. i am trying to code this in clicking most and came out with some errors.
an example of what i am intending to achieve:
skulled: protect item + donator = 2 items on death
if this can be achieved i would also to make a level 2 donator to keep 2 items on death so it be like
skulled: protect item + (donator == 2) = 3 items on death
can anyone help me please??

item.title: Making donator status keep an extra item on death
item.dc:creator: @xD3ad xD3ad
item.description:
@xD3ad wrote:

Search for your death code.
If(death or smth like dat. iunno. deathstage i think?

Next. Look at it, and under it add an ELSE;
then if(Donator = 1); // Iunno, not looking @ server. // its my referral ;D
Look at the deathstage code. you should be able to find sumthin liek hw many items kept.
Copy the damn thing and paste it under if(donator thingy.
Change the number of items kept then.

shd work, iunno giving suggestions on how i think it will work.

Read full topic
item.source: Making donator status keep an extra item on death
